title: Create and Design Characters, Props, Environments
purpose: Describe the core function Create and Design Characters, Props, Environments.
guardrails: Follow art direction and brand guidelines strictly; do not diverge from approved visual style
Avoid over‑detailing or exceeding polygon and texture budget constraints
Maintain consistent naming conventions and file organization to support pipeline integration
Use only licensed textures or original creations; document sources and rights
Ensure rigs are compatible with the animation software and game engine
Keep detailed records of iterations and maintain version control for all assets
Do not start final rendering or lighting without approval; focus on asset readiness
Complete all work within the allocated development schedule and communicate delays promptly
